fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Hack a player each Night. You will grant them death immunity for the phase.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you use your ability, your defense is lowered by a tier the next night if your target isn't a member of the Town.
- It takes two more votes to hang you.
- You are an Android at heart, and your first attribute doesn't apply if you use your ability on an Android. Additionally, granting death immunity lasts two phases instead of one when used on an Android.
- Cannot self-target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game. If Androids are in the game, you must ensure they win instead, even if you die in the process.
